text:
[Verse]
Lights flash all around
City's making sounds
I'm just one of many
Shadows in the crowd

[Verse 2]
Faces moving fast
Moments never last
Caught up in the whirl
Time's a fading past

[Chorus]
Lost in the crowd
Hear the city loud
Trying to be found
In this sea unbowed

[Verse 3]
Neon signs collide
Taxis side by side
Searching for a place
Where my heart can glide

[Bridge]
Underneath the stars
Dreaming without bars
Feel the rhythm call
Healing all our scars

[Verse 4]
Friends are in the mix
Counting city clicks
Lost but never lonely
Finding my own fix
title: Lost In The Crowd
